body:
Neither "cat" nor "type" are necessary in any case.  Whenever a command is written:


! cat file | program arg1 arg2 ..


you can replace it with:


!program arg1 arg2 .. < file


This works on Unix and Windows, so no need to specialize.


-Greg
___
